Membership Options
Membership at Golf Club of the Everglades enables you to escape from the stresses of everyday life and enjoy the natural aesthetics and tranquil surroundings of the Golf Course. Unlike most area Clubs, Golf Club of the Everglades does not have tee times and Members play at their leisure.
Golf Club of the Everglades enjoys an exclusive Membership combined with Team Members that know the Members and cares deeply about their needs; resulting in a one-of-a-kind experience.
Untitled Basic Web Content

Meetings and Special Events in the Houston Area
Experience the Unforgettable
Whether you’re planning a wedding, a charity event, a special banquet, or a corporate gathering, Golf Club of Everglades presents luxurious surroundings and top notch service, making for an exquisite experience your Guests won’t soon forget.
Cocktail receptions, family celebrations, holiday parties – there’s no end to the special occasions you can celebrate with us. Contact us to speak to our event Team Members. They’re the best in the business and they can help make your next social event the celebration of the year.
Complete the form to begin planning!
Baby Showers
Birthday Parties
Bridal Showers
Celebrations of Life
Corporate Meetings/Events
Graduations
Golf Tournaments
Holiday Parties
Rehearsal Dinners
Send-Off Brunches
Weddings
& So Much More!
Please note membership is not required to host events at these exquisite properties.

Dine at Northgate Country Club Public
Dine With Us
From a casual dinner with friends to a date night with your significant other, our dining options are the perfect location for your next meal. Join today to enjoy these spectacular menus along with Chef's specials!

Discover a Resort Lifestyle Second to None at Two Premier Clubs
A Premier Private Golf Club
In the Heart of Naples, FL
Golf Club of the Everglades boasts a warm and welcoming, family-centric lifestyle. There is something for everyone to enjoy; A Members only Clubhouse and restaurant, a top-ranked Rees Jones designed Golf Course and a world-class practice area.
